page.title: 12OFFCHURCH - MOBILE LIBRARY.
page.content:
For over 30 years the{Mobile Library service has come to the Offchurch area. It is an amenity which is much appreciated by the local people who would otherwise have to journey to Southam or Leamington for books. The timetable is as follows:- { Week 1 - Monday Offchurch, Tudor Cottages 9.40 am. " Railway Cotts 10.45 am. " The Chalet 12.00 am. { Week 2 - Thursday Snowford Hall Cotts 9.40 am Fosse Farm 10.12.am
The van contains over{2000 books arranged on shelves for selection by {adults and children.}Wall space is made attractive with posters about coming events in the district.{The {members of staff are welcoming and {friendly to all who visit them.
